Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add backend project structure, Pydantic v2 models, config, and utilities

- OrchestratorState as TypedDict for LangGraph shared state
- Central config via pydantic-settings loading from .env
- Dependency factories \(async DB sessions, ChatOllama, ChromaDB\)

- @timed_agent decorator for agent execution tracing
- Project scaffolding \(pyproject.toml, docker-compose, CLAUDE.md\)
